Package hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer

Class RayCasterParallel.CastingJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinTask<java.lang.Void>
      • java.util.concurrent.RecursiveAction
        • hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.RayCasterParallel.CastingJob
  • Enclosing class:
    RayCasterParallel

    public static class RayCasterParallel.CastingJob
extends java.util.concurrent.RecursiveAction
    Represents a rendering scene job in rendering scene using Ray casting algorithm and Phong's model.
    Author:
    Dorian Ivankovic
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int threshold
      Size of scene columns for which job division is no longer done; the smallest job unit.

        Parameters:
        yMin - - Start y coordinate
        yMax - - End y coordinate
        eye - - Observers position
        horizontal - - Horizontal width of observed space
        vertical - - Vertical height of observed space
        height - - Number of pixel per screen column
        width - - Number of pixels per screen row
        red - - Red components of the frame.
        green - - Green components of the frame.
        blue - - Blue components of the frame.
        xAxis - - x-axis vector in the view-frame
        yAxis - - y-axis vector in the view-frame
        zAxis - - z-axis vector in the view-frame
        screenCorner - - Corner of the screen.
        scene - - contains objects and light sources in the scene
